name: Wild Rice, Corn, and Black Bean Quesadillas
author: Uncle Ben's
summary: Quick, easy, and flavorful wild rice quesadilla made with UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® Long Grain and Wild Rice.
ingredients: 1 (8.8 ounce) package UNCLE BEN'S® Ready Rice® Long Grain & Wild
½ cup reduced-sodium black beans, rinsed and drained
½ cup frozen sweet corn, thawed
½ cup mild salsa, plus more for serving if desired
directions: Prepare rice according to package directions
Mix rice, shredded cheese, beans, corn, green onions, together in a bowl
Place a quarter of the mixture on one side of each tortilla
Top with about 2 tablespoons of mild salsa
Gently fold each tortilla in half
Spray a small saute pan with non-stick cooking spray; set over medium-high heat
Place one quesadilla in saute pan
Cook until lightly golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes on each side
Spray the pan with additional oil, as needed, to cook the next 3 quesadillas
Let quesadillas cool slightly and cut in half
Serve with additional mild salsa, if desired
